sn35.248:4.4: Evañhi sā, bhikkhave, yavakalāpī suhatā assa chahi byābhaṅgīhi haññamānā.
sn35.248:4.6: So taṃ yavakalāpiṃ sattamāya byābhaṅgiyā haneyya.
sn35.248:4.7: Evañhi sā bhikkhave, yavakalāpī suhatatarā assa, sattamāya byābhaṅgiyā haññamānā.
sn35.248:4.8: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, assutavā puthujjano cakkhusmiṃ haññati manāpāmanāpehi rūpehi … pe …
sn35.248:4.11: Sace so, bhikkhave, assutavā puthujjano āyatiṃ punabbhavāya ceteti, evañhi so, bhikkhave, moghapuriso suhatataro hoti, seyyathāpi sā yavakalāpī sattamāya byābhaṅgiyā haññamānā.
sn35.248:5.1: Bhūtapubbaṃ, bhikkhave, devāsurasaṅgāmo samupabyūḷho ahosi.
sn35.248:5.2: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo asure āmantesi:
sn35.248:5.3: ‘sace, mārisā, devāsurasaṅgāme samupabyūḷhe asurā jineyyuṃ devā parājineyyuṃ, yena naṃ sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ kaṇṭhapañcamehi bandhanehi bandhitvā mama santike āneyyātha asurapuran’ti.
sn35.248:5.4: Sakkopi kho, bhikkhave, devānamindo deve tāvatiṃse āmantesi:
sn35.248:5.5: ‘sace, mārisā, devāsurasaṅgāme samupabyūḷhe devā jineyyuṃ asurā parājineyyuṃ, yena naṃ vepacittiṃ asurindaṃ kaṇṭhapañcamehi bandhanehi bandhitvā mama santike āneyyātha sudhammaṃ devasabhan’ti.
sn35.248:5.6: Tasmiṃ kho pana, bhikkhave, saṅgāme devā jiniṃsu, asurā parājiniṃsu.
sn35.248:5.7: Atha kho, bhikkhave, devā tāvatiṃsā vepacittiṃ asurindaṃ kaṇṭhapañcamehi bandhanehi bandhitvā sakkassa devānamindassa santike ānesuṃ sudhammaṃ devasabhaṃ.
sn35.248:5.8: Tatra sudaṃ, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo kaṇṭhapañcamehi bandhanehi baddho hoti.
sn35.248:5.9: Yadā kho, bhikkhave, vepacittissa asurindassa evaṃ hoti:
sn35.248:5.10: ‘dhammikā kho devā, adhammikā asurā, idheva dānāhaṃ devapuraṃ gacchāmī’ti.
sn35.248:5.11: Atha kaṇṭhapañcamehi bandhanehi muttaṃ attānaṃ samanupassati, dibbehi ca pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappito samaṅgībhūto paricāreti.
sn35.248:5.12: Yadā ca kho, bhikkhave, vepacittissa asurindassa evaṃ hoti:
sn35.248:5.13: ‘dhammikā kho asurā, adhammikā devā, tattheva dānāhaṃ asurapuraṃ gamissāmī’ti, atha kaṇṭhapañcamehi bandhanehi baddhaṃ attānaṃ samanupassati.
sn35.248:5.17: Maññamāno kho, bhikkhave, baddho mārassa, amaññamāno mutto pāpimato.
sn35.248:6.1: * ‘Asmī’ti, bhikkhave, maññitametaṃ, ‘ayamahamasmī’ti maññitametaṃ, ‘bhavissan’ti maññitametaṃ, ‘na bhavissan’ti maññitametaṃ, ‘rūpī bhavissan’ti maññitametaṃ, ‘arūpī bhavissan’ti maññitametaṃ, ‘saññī bhavissan’ti maññitametaṃ, ‘asaññī bhavissan’ti maññitametaṃ, ‘nevasaññīnāsaññī bhavissan’ti maññitametaṃ.
sn35.248:6.2: Maññitaṃ, bhikkhave, rogo, maññitaṃ gaṇḍo, maññitaṃ sallaṃ.
sn35.248:6.3: Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, ‘amaññamānena cetasā viharissāmā’ti—
sn35.248:7.1: ‘Asmī’ti, bhikkhave, iñjitametaṃ, ‘ayamahamasmī’ti iñjitametaṃ, ‘bhavissan’ti iñjitametaṃ, ‘na bhavissan’ti iñjitametaṃ, ‘rūpī bhavissan’ti iñjitametaṃ, ‘arūpī bhavissan’ti iñjitametaṃ, ‘saññī bhavissan’ti iñjitametaṃ, ‘asaññī bhavissan’ti iñjitametaṃ, ‘nevasaññīnāsaññī bhavissan’ti iñjitametaṃ.
sn35.248:7.2: Iñjitaṃ, bhikkhave, rogo, iñjitaṃ gaṇḍo, iñjitaṃ sallaṃ.
sn35.248:7.3: Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, ‘aniñjamānena cetasā viharissāmā’ti—
sn35.248:8.8: Phanditaṃ, bhikkhave, rogo, phanditaṃ gaṇḍo, phanditaṃ sallaṃ.
sn35.248:8.9: Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, ‘aphandamānena cetasā viharissāmā’ti—
sn35.248:9.8: Papañcitaṃ, bhikkhave, rogo, papañcitaṃ gaṇḍo, papañcitaṃ sallaṃ.
sn35.248:10.1: ‘Asmī’ti, bhikkhave, mānagatametaṃ, ‘ayamahamasmī’ti mānagatametaṃ, ‘bhavissan’ti mānagatametaṃ, ‘na bhavissan’ti mānagatametaṃ, ‘rūpī bhavissan’ti mānagatametaṃ, ‘arūpī bhavissan’ti mānagatametaṃ, ‘saññī bhavissan’ti mānagatametaṃ, ‘asaññī bhavissan’ti mānagatametaṃ, ‘nevasaññīnāsaññī bhavissan’ti mānagatametaṃ.
sn35.248:10.2: Mānagataṃ, bhikkhave, rogo, mānagataṃ gaṇḍo, mānagataṃ sallaṃ.
